ValidationRule.description: Validation Rule for Asset Activation Date. It should not be in the past.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR (vlocity_cmt__ActivationDate__c<TODAY()) && (NOT( ISCHANGED( vlocity_cmt__CatalogItemReferenceDateTime__c ) ) || ISCHANGED( vlocity_cmt__ActivationDate__c ) ) && (NOT( ISCHANGED( vlocity_cmt__ProductHierarchyGroupKeyPath__c )) || ISCHANGED( vlocity_cmt__ActivationDate__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Activation Date cannot be in the past.
